title: Tesla and 4 More Earnings Announcements to Watch This Week
text:
Earnings season is trundling on, and even though we got numbers from companies like JPMorgan Chase (JPM), Netflix (NFLX) and UnitedHealth Group (UNH) last week, this week looks set to be even more exciting.

Earnings season is going well so far. Some 73 S&P 500 companies have reported third-quarter earnings, according to I/B/E/S data from Refinitiv, and nearly 84% have topped expectations, well above the 65% average since 1994. Even comparing the numbers to recent history shows a beat rate that is well above average, as...
description: Earnings season is trundling on, and even though we got numbers from companies like JPMorgan Chase, Netflix and UnitedHealth Group last week, this week looks set to be even more exciting.
